messages.title: Henrietta Hensher: Vote for a strong voice on 7th May
messages.content: Growing the economy, so we can afford the services we all need. Renegotiating our relationship with Europe and then giving everyone a vote on EU membership.

messages.title: Cancer treatment postcode lottery must end
messages.content: Henrietta Hensher, prospective MP for Ceredigion, is calling on the Welsh Labour Government to create a Welsh Cancer Treatments Fund to end the postcode lottery in cancer treatment settlements.

messages.title: Labour’s failure costing £149 per family
messages.content: Henrietta Hensher is calling on the Welsh Labour Government to take action over increasingly council tax bills, after failing to press on the council tax freeze that is being enjoyed by over two million families in England, due to the council tax freeze fund.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Build a stronger economy for Ceredigion that creates jobs and better wages.
Support our Welsh NHS by protecting its budget and campaigning for a Cancer Treatments Fund.
Stand up for Welsh farmers - who play such an important part in the rural economy.

mentions.candidate: Henrietta Hensher is passionate about Ceredigion and would work hard to build a better future for everyone.

issues.brexitEurope: Renegotiating our relationship with Europe and then giving everyone a vote on EU membership.
issues.economy: Labour’s failure costing £149 per family - action over increasingly council tax bills.
issues.health: Cancer treatment postcode lottery must end, proposing a Welsh Cancer Treatments Fund.

housing.content: Labour’s failure costing £149 per family - council tax issues.

images.caption: Henrietta Hensher for a strong voice on 7th May
